ingredient_list: Calamari rings; Martian spice blend; Red algae paste; Cosmic salt
steps: Clean the calamari rings and pat dry.|Marinate calamari in Martian spice blend for at least 30 minutes.|Heat a pan and add Red algae paste. Saute for 5 minutes.|Add marinated calamari and cook until tender. Season with Cosmic salt.

ingredient_list: Hydroponic lettuce; Lunar mushrooms; Moon cheese; Space vinaigrette
steps: Wash and chop the hydroponic lettuce and lunar mushrooms.|Combine lettuce
vegetarian: and moon cheese in a bowl.|Drizzle with space vinaigrette and serve.

ingredient_list: Sunstone crystals; Photon peppers; Solar flares; Star anise
steps: Grind Sunstone crystals into a fine powder.|SautÃ© Photon peppers with Star anise.|Add Solar flares and Sunstone powder to a pot with water. Simmer for 2 hours.|Strain and serve hot.

ingredient_list: Anti-gravity apples; Space flour; Cosmic sugar; Astro-butter
steps: Peel and slice the anti-gravity apples.|Mix space flour
vegetarian: and astro-butter to form a crust.|Fill the crust with apple slices and bake until golden brown.

ingredient_list: Nebula noodles; Stardust sauce; Comet chives; Black hole pepper
steps: Cook Nebula noodles according to package directions.|Toss with Stardust sauce
